languages.text: "Разум должен быть открыт ко всем формам Знания. Приказываю провести проверку. В случае, если твоя версия о ленности их умов подтвердится, я буду ходатайствовать о наложении епитимьи".

traits.locale_text: "Разум должен быть открыт ко всем формам Знания. Приказываю провести проверку. В случае, если твоя версия о ленности их умов подтвердится, я буду ходатайствовать о наложении епитимьи".

languages.text: "The mind must be open to all forms of Knowledge. I order you to commence a check. In the event that your account of the indolence of their minds is confirmed, I will petition for the appropriate penance."
languages.original_text: "Разум должен быть открыт ко всем формам Знания. Приказываю провести проверку. В случае, если твоя версия о ленности их умов подтвердится, я буду ходатайствовать о наложении епитимьи".

traits.locale_text: "The mind must be open to all forms of Knowledge. I order you to commence a check. In the event that your version of the laziness of their minds is confirmed, I will petition for the appropriate penance."

"The mind must be open to all forms of Knowledge. I order you to commence a check. In the event that your version of the laziness of their minds is confirmed, I will petition for the appropriate penance."

"The mind must be open to all forms of Knowledge. I order you to commence a check. In the event that your account of the indolence of their minds is confirmed, I will petition for the appropriate penance."

"The mind must be open to all forms of Knowledge. I order you to commence a check. In the event that your account of the indolence of their minds is confirmed, I will petition for the appropriate penance."

"The mind must be open to all forms of Knowledge. I order you to commence a check. In the event that your account of the indolence of their minds is confirmed, I will petition for the appropriate penance."

languages.text: 「あらゆる形の知識に心を開かなくてはならぬ。一点、確認を命じる。同胞の心に怠惰が芽吹いているという報告を受けた場合には、適切に自己処罰を行うよう求める」
languages.original_text: "The mind must be open to all forms of Knowledge. I order you to commence a check. In the event that your account of the indolence of their minds is confirmed, I will petition for the appropriate penance."

traits.locale_text: 「あらゆる形の知識に心を開かなくてはならぬ。一点、確認を命じる。同胞の心に怠惰が芽吹いているという報告を受けた場合には、適切に自己処罰を行うよう求める」

languages.text: “思想必须接纳各种形式的知识。我命令你开始检查，如果如你所言，他们思想确实存在懒惰，那我需要他们进行适当的忏悔。”
languages.original_text: "The mind must be open to all forms of Knowledge. I order you to commence a check. In the event that your account of the indolence of their minds is confirmed, I will petition for the appropriate penance."

traits.locale_text: “思想必须接纳各种形式的知识。我命令你开始检查，如果如你所言，他们思想确实存在懒惰，那我需要他们进行适当的忏悔。”

languages.text: «La mente ha de estar abierta al conocimiento en todas sus formas. Te ordeno que emprendas tal verificación. En caso de que se confirme tu sospecha sobre la indolencia de sus mentes, solicitaré el castigo pertinente».
languages.original_text: "The mind must be open to all forms of Knowledge. I order you to commence a check. In the event that your account of the indolence of their minds is confirmed, I will petition for the appropriate penance."

traits.locale_text: «La mente ha de estar abierta al conocimiento en todas sus formas. Te ordeno que emprendas tal verificación. En caso de que se confirme tu sospecha sobre la indolencia de sus mentes, solicitaré el castigo pertinente».

languages.text: "Der Geist muss allen Formen von Wissen offenstehen. Ich befehle eine Überprüfung. Falls Eure Aussage über die Trägheit ihres Geists bestätigt wird, werde ich für eine angemessene Strafe plädieren."
languages.original_text: "The mind must be open to all forms of Knowledge. I order you to commence a check. In the event that your account of the indolence of their minds is confirmed, I will petition for the appropriate penance."

traits.locale_text: "Der Geist muss allen Formen von Wissen offenstehen. Ich befehle eine Überprüfung. Falls Eure Aussage über die Trägheit ihres Geists bestätigt wird, werde ich für eine angemessene Strafe plädieren."

languages.text: « Il convient d'avoir l'esprit ouvert à toutes formes de connaissance. Je vous ordonne de procéder à une vérification. En cas de confirmation de paresse intellectuelle, je demanderai un châtiment approprié. »
languages.original_text: "The mind must be open to all forms of Knowledge. I order you to commence a check. In the event that your account of the indolence of their minds is confirmed, I will petition for the appropriate penance."

traits.locale_text: « Il convient d'avoir l'esprit ouvert à toutes formes de connaissance. Je vous ordonne de procéder à une vérification. En cas de confirmation de paresse intellectuelle, je demanderai un châtiment approprié. »

languages.text: "Zihin her türlü İrfana açık olmalıdır. Bir kontrol gerçekleştirmeni emrediyorum. Eğer zihinlerinin miskinliği konusundaki ifadeniz doğrulanırsa gerekli cezanın verilmesi talebinde bulunacağım."
languages.original_text: "The mind must be open to all forms of Knowledge. I order you to commence a check. In the event that your account of the indolence of their minds is confirmed, I will petition for the appropriate penance."

traits.locale_text: "Zihin her türlü İrfana açık olmalıdır. Bir kontrol gerçekleştirmeni emrediyorum. Eğer zihinlerinin miskinliği konusundaki ifadeniz doğrulanırsa gerekli cezanın verilmesi talebinde bulunacağım."
